comment._content: I love the PAA bag - Pan American Airways-, underneath the umbrella. That later became the PanAm, unfortunately long gone.

comment.author: 38254353@N05
comment._content: I visited Overhill Lake in the early 90's as a teen...it still looked like this then!

comment.author: 75529718@N08
comment._content: this was my hangout in the 70's..pretty much all summer long..i loved this place.. even on friday and saturday evenings they would have bands play there.. one in perticular.. was the BLACK ROSE..Which in the drummer went to same high school.. wish it stayed the way it was.. price wise as well...75cents.. to maybe 1.25 to get in.. and sand all around and in the pool. high dive of 17 ft..love it
